title: Engineering an annular donor–acceptor reaction chamber with spontaneous feedstock collection for boosting CO2 photoreduction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01543F, Paper
Zhanpeng Zhou, Hao Zeng, Chengyang Feng, Ling Li, Rongdi Tang, Wenbo Li, Ying Huang, Yaocheng Deng
The interaction between methyl and phosphorus atoms constructs a porous reaction chamber and an annular electron donor–acceptor structure in g-C3N4, inducing a spontaneous collection mechanism of feedstock to enhance photoreduction of CO2 to CO.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
